reg.title: LWBC Inc. Retention of Fees Regulation

definition.def: means an agreement, the parties to which include the government, a first nation and LWBC, respecting an accommodation to a concern of the first nation relating to a disposition or proposed disposition;
, for a period, means the amount calculated by the following formula:

section.subsandwich: A = the total of amounts that in the period

paragraph.paragraphtext: LWBC is authorized or required under delegated authority to collect,
LWBC has not collected, and
come within the classification of doubtful accounts under generally accepted accounting principles;

section.subsandwich: B = the total of amounts that

paragraph.paragraphtext: for an earlier period were included in the description of A, and
have been collected in the period referred to in the description of A;

definition.def: means the powers and functions delegated to LWBC by the minister under

paragraph.paragraphtext: section 97 (1) of the Land Act,
section 3 (3) (a) of the Ministry of Land, Parks and Housing Act, or
section 15.1 of the University Endowment Land Act;

definition.def: means a disposition of Crown land under the Land Act, the Ministry of Land, Parks and Housing Act or the University Endowment Land Act;
, for a period, means all the following incurred and paid by LWBC in relation to Crown land, the fee simple of which has been disposed of in the period by LWBC, exercising delegated authority:

paragraph.paragraphtext: costs that

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: would not have been incurred by LWBC but for the disposition, and
are directly attributable to the disposition;

paragraph.paragraphtext: costs incurred to increase the market value of the Crown land;
costs incurred to acquire some or all of the Crown land;
costs incurred to market the Crown land;
costs incurred in accordance with an accommodation agreement related to the disposition,

section.defsandwich: but does not include operating or administrative expenses of LWBC;

definition.def: , for a period, means all the following incurred and paid by LWBC in relation to Crown land, an interest in which, other than the fee simple interest, has been disposed of in the period by LWBC, exercising delegated authority:

paragraph.paragraphtext: costs that

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: would not have been incurred by LWBC but for the disposition, and
are directly attributable to the disposition;

paragraph.paragraphtext: costs incurred to increase the market value of the Crown land;
costs incurred to acquire some or all of the Crown land;
costs incurred to market the interest in the Crown land;
costs incurred in accordance with an accommodation agreement related to the disposition,

section.defsandwich: but does not include operating or administrative expenses of LWBC;

definition.def: means an aboriginal governing body, however organized and established by aboriginal people in their traditional territory in British Columbia;
, for a period, means interest that

paragraph.paragraphtext: becomes payable in the period to LWBC on money received or collected by it, exercising delegated authority, or
becomes payable in the period to LWBC, as the minister's delegate, on overdue amounts described in paragraph (a) and (b) of the definition of "net tenure revenue";

definition.def: means Land and Water British Columbia Inc., a body corporate, incorporated under the laws of the Province under Certificate of Incorporation 258741;
means the minister charged with responsibility for the administration of the Land Act;
, for a period, means amounts that become payable in the period to LWBC, as the minister's delegate, in relation to dispositions in fee simple that LWBC makes under delegated authority, less

paragraph.paragraphtext: the eligible fee simple expenses for the dispositions, and
fees collected under B.C. Reg. 177/2003 in relation to those dispositions;
amounts, other than variable amounts and interest, that become payable in the period to LWBC, as the minister's delegate, in relation to

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: dispositions, other than dispositions in fee simple, made under delegated authority, or
Crown land administered by LWBC under delegated authority, and

paragraph.paragraphtext: variable amounts received in the period by LWBC as the minister's delegate,
the eligible tenure expenses for the dispositions, and
fees collected under B.C. Reg. 177/2003 in relation to those dispositions;

definition.def: includes LWBC employee salaries and benefits and costs associated with LWBC employee travel;

means amounts that under an agreement in relation to Crown land or a disposition, other than a disposition in fee simple, vary by the amount of use of Crown land, the amount of resources extracted from Crown land or some other variable specified in the disposition or agreement.

section.marginalnote: Retention authorized respecting dispositions of Crown land
section.sectiontext: For all services performed in a period in relation to collecting, receiving or managing public money under delegated authority, LWBC is authorized to retain, from money collected or received by LWBC as the minister's delegate,

paragraph.paragraphtext: the eligible fee simple expenses for the period,
the eligible tenure expenses for the period,
10% of net fee simple revenue for the period,
40% of net tenure revenue for the period,
interest for the period, and
the fees collected under B.C. Reg. 177/2003 for the period,

section.subsandwich: less the adjustment amount for the period.
